description.x-y:

that are in the air. Those Pokémon are
knocked down to the ground.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.shortEffect: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
